resources.string: Do you wish to delete the category \"%s\"?
Would you like to sort the categories alphabetically?
InternalError: Check crash logs for further information
Let\'s set some things up first. You can always change these in the settings later too.

Select a folder where %1$s will store chapter downloads, backups, and more.

A dedicated folder is recommended.

Selected folder: %2$s
Updating from an older version and not sure what to select? Refer to the storage guide for more information.
Get notified for library updates and more.
Avoid interruptions to long-running library updates, downloads, and backup restores.
New to %s? We recommend checking out the getting started guide.
At what point to mark the episode as seen
Preserve watch position on seen episodes
Only appears if the video has chapters
Remember and switch to the last used brightness
Remember and switch to the last used volume
Hide player controls when opening the player
Show system status bar with controls
Enable the use of PiP mode
Show episode toasts when switching episodes in PiP mode
Automatically switch to PiP mode on exiting the player
Replaces the "Skip 10 seconds" option with "Previous episode"
When enabled, seeking will not focus on keyframes, leading to slower but precise seeking
AniSkip requires the anime to be tracked with MAL or Anilist to work
When a tap gesture is set to "Custom", it can be bound through input.conf. The key codes are 0x10001 for left, 0x10002 for center, and 0x10003 for right.
When a media control is set to "Custom", it can be bound through input.conf. The key codes are 0x10004 for previous, 0x10005 for play/pause, and 0x10006 for next.
May fix black screens on some video codecs, can also improve performance at the cost of quality
Subtitle language(s) to be selected by default on a video with multiple subtitles, Two- or three-letter languages codes work. Multiple values can be delimited by a comma.
Whitelist for subtitles. If a whitelist is defined, the first subtitle that contains a whitelisted word will be used. Multiple values can be delimited by a comma.
Blacklist for subtitles. If a blacklist is defined, all subtitles that contains a blacklisted word will be filtered out. Multiple values can be delimited by a comma.
Preferred languages, pitch correction, audio channels
Audio language(s) to be selected by default on a video with multiple audio streams, Two- or three-letter languages codes work. Multiple values can be delimited by a comma.
Prevents the audio from becoming high-pitched at faster speeds and low-pitched at slower speeds
Execute lua code with custom buttons
You have no custom buttons. Tap the plus button to create a custom button.
Do you wish to delete the button "%s"?
Edit MPV configuration file for further player settings
Edit MPV input file for keyboard mapping configuration
Some filters may not work on your current video driver
Prevents the audio from becoming high-pitched at faster speeds and low-pitched at slower speeds
Secondary subtitles will have no ASS/SSA Styling.
Secure screen hides app contents when switching apps and block screenshots
Show in sources and extensions lists
This does not prevent unofficial or potentially incorrectly flagged extensions from surfacing NSFW (18+) content within the app.
Check for new cover and details when updating library
Malicious extensions can read any stored login credentials or execute arbitrary code.\n\nBy trusting this extension, you accept these risks.
This extension is no longer available. It may not function properly and can cause issues with the app. Uninstalling it is recommended.
Do you really want to remove \"%s\" extension?
Sources from this extension may contain NSFW (18+) content
Permissions are needed to install extensions. Tap here to grant.
Install and start Shizuku to use Shizuku as extension installer.
Add additional repos to Aniyomi. This should be a URL that ends with \"index.min.json\".
Do you wish to delete the repo \"%s\"?
Do you wish to add the repo \"%s\"?
Repository %1$s has the same Signing Key Fingerprint as %2$s.\nIf this is expected, %2$s will be replaced, otherwise contact your repo maintainer.
Briefly show when reader is opened
If the placement of the split wide pages don\'t match reading direction
Flip orientation of rotated wide pages
Briefly show current mode when reader is opened
Preserve reading position on read chapters
Creates folders according to entries\' title
Sensitivity for hiding menu on scroll
Entries in excluded categories will not be downloaded even if they are also in included categories.
Only works if the current chapter/episode + the next one are already downloaded.
One-way sync to update the chapter progress in external tracker services. Set up tracking for individual entries from their tracking button.
Provides enhanced features for specific sources. Entries are automatically tracked when added to your library.
Used for automatic backups, chapter downloads, and local source.
Can be used to restore current library
Backup does not contain any library entries.
You may need to install any missing extensions and log in to tracking services afterwards to use them.
What do you want to backup?
Include sensitive settings (e.g., tracker login tokens)
No library entries to back up
Backup/restore may not function properly if MIUI Optimization is disabled.
You should keep copies of backups in other places as well.
User agent string can not be blank
Requires app restart to take effect
Delete history for entries that are not saved in your library
Resets reading mode and orientation of all series
Saves error logs to a file for sharing with the developers
Helps with background library updates and backups
Some manufacturers have additional app restrictions that kill background services. This website has more info on how to fix it.
Print verbose logs to system log (reduces app performance)
F-Droid builds are not officially supported.\nTap to learn more.
Filters all entries in your library
You have an entry in your library with the same name.\n\nDo you still wish to continue?
New chapters predicted to be released in around %1$s, checking around every %2$s.
New episodes predicted to be released in around %1$s, checking around every %2$s.
This manga is either completed, or there is no predicted release date.
This anime is either completed, or there is no predicted release date.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected chapters?
Are you sure you want to save these settings as default?
This will remove your previously selected start date from %s
This will remove your previously selected finish date from %s
This will remove the tracking locally.
A category with this name already exists!
This will remove the read date of this chapter. Are you sure?
Use this image as cover art?
Unable to open last read chapter
Are you sure? All history will be lost.
Select a source to migrate from
%s ran into an unexpected error. We suggest you share the crash logs in our support channel on Discord.
Couldn\'t download chapters. You can try again in the downloads section
Large updates harm sources and may lead to slower updates and also increased battery usage. Tap to learn more.
Please add the entry to your library before doing this
For help on how to fix library update errors, see %1$s
Skipped because there are unread chapters
Skipped because no chapters are read
Skipped because series does not require updates
Skipped because no release was expected today
Failed to acquire persistent folder access. The app may behave unexpectedly.
This Android version is no longer supported
A new version is available from the official releases. Tap to learn how to migrate from unofficial F-Droid releases.
No entries found in this category
You have no categories. Tap the plus button to create one for organizing your library.
You don\'t have any categories yet.
Tap here for help with Cloudflare
Please update the WebView app for better compatibility
Could not download chapter due to unexpected error
Couldn\'t find file path of page %d
See your recently updated library entries
Widget not available when app lock is enabled
You are about to remove \"%s\" from your library
Warning: Backing up settings will store your track passwords as well, do not share this backup file!
Move History to the More tab
Move Updates to the More tab
Move Manga to the More tab
Move Browse to the More tab
Only search pinned manga sources in global search
Only search pinned anime sources in global search
Hide manga entries already in library
Hide anime entries already in library
Set start screen to Manga Tab
Skip entries with unseen episode(s)/unread chapter(s)
Show unseen/unread count on Updates icon
Manga in excluded categories will not be updated even if they are also in included categories.
Anime in excluded categories will not be updated even if they are also in included categories.
This extension is not from the official list.
This extension is not from the official list.
Always use external downloader for anime
Only works on entries in library and if the current episode plus the next one are already downloaded
Update progress when marked as read/watched
Open track menu on adding to library
What information to include in the backup file
Used by anime: %1$s, used by manga: %2$s
Clear episode/chapter cache on app launch
Delete history for manga that are not saved in your library
Delete history for anime that are not saved in your library
Are you sure? Completed episodes and chapters and progress of non-library entries will be lost
Are you sure you wish to delete \"%s\"?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected episodes?
Also apply to all manga in my library
Also apply to all anime in my library
This will remove the watch date of this episode. Are you sure?
Reset all episodes for this anime
Reset all chapters for this manga
Couldn\'t download due to low storage space
Warning: large bulk downloads may lead to sources becoming slower and/or blocking Aniyomi. Tap to learn more.
WebView is required for the app to function
Force app to recheck downloaded chapters and episodes
Copied video quality link to clipboard
Hide hidden categories from categories and storage screen
Compress images before downloading or loading in reader
Use data saver in the downloader
Higher values mean that a higher percentage of the image quality is saved, but it also means the file size is larger, 80 percent is a good median between file size and image quality
The Jpeg file size is considerably smaller then Webp is(meaning more data is saved), but it makes the images lose more quality as well.\nCurrently compresses to Jpeg
The Jpeg file size is considerably smaller then Webp is(meaning more data is saved), but it makes the images lose more quality as well.\nCurrently compresses to Webp
Bandwidth Hero (requires a Bandwidth Hero Proxy server)
Put Bandwidth Hero Proxy server url here
Will only download concurrently from self-hosted or unmetered sources
Enable single thread and no range downloading mode
Number of threads to use for downloading, might get your IP blocked if too high, usually 4 is a good number to avoid heavy load on source servers.
Set to 0 to disable the speed limit.
